participant_1.name: Luna
participant_1.personality: Creative and whimsical, with a passion for science and a love for pets.
participant_1.background: I love lasagna like I am Garfield. I have a poster of Neil DeGrasse Tyson on my wall. My two dogs are the best friends a girl could have. Penn & Teller are my favorite magicians. I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Playful and quirky, with a flair for humor and a fondness for unique collections.
participant_2.background: I collect toys wearing little rain coats. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with other people. I am lusting after the neighbor's pool boy. I enjoy mystery flavor cake. I believe I hear voices.

content.text: I love lasagna like I am Garfield.
I love lasagna too! I have a poster of Neil DeGrasse Tyson on my wall.
I love Penn & Teller! They are my favorite magicians.
I like them too! I have a pool boy next door that I am lusting after.
That's interesting. I have two dogs that are the best friends a girl could have.
I like dogs too! I collect toys that wear little rain coats.
That's cute! I want to be an astronaut when I grow up.
That sounds delicious! I believe I hear voices.
That's interesting. I tend to argue with myself more than I argue with other people.
I think you're a very interesting person.
Thanks! I think you're a very interesting person too.
